tags.description: Sand/mud/rock beach with grass strip usable to ~4.6m tide. Sheltered, undeveloped. Good seasonal creek. Respect IR (reserve) land. Old house at village site.
tags.name: Blunden Harbour (BCMT)

tags.description: Low gradient sand, gravel, boulder beach protected at all tides. End of the lagoon muddy. Day use. Undeveloped. Sheltered. Camp at top of beach between bushes, above all but highest tides. Level pebble, gravel. Other sites to N have worse landings.
tags.name: Kent Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Day use. Small stream crosses SW part of beach. Directly to NE of stream,10 m path leads to tent flat behind big cedar. May need brushing. Alternate camp on protected beach. Additional upland potential sites could be brushed.
tags.name: Kent Island 2 (BCMT)

tags.description: Day use. Sheltered, undeveloped. Little beach above high tide. Not a good site, but useful shelter if crossing QC Strait. Might instead be 50Deg 54.063'N 127Deg 32.094'W.
tags.name: Kent Island 3 (BCMT)

tags.description: Sand, crushed shell beach. Low tide entrance may be blocked by rocks (fish trap weir?). Sites in 2 mossy forest clearings above steep bank on N side of bay. Wilderness camping allowed. Midden location, no fires except on beach. Trail to resort reported.
tags.name: Harlequin Bay (BCMT)

tags.description: Dispersed site secondary. Up steep bank 4 M high on obvious midden. 50° 50.278'N 127° 35.618'W. Not visible from main passage. No facilities,Random wilderness camping. No fees charged. Obvious midden location, so avoid all fires except on beach.
tags.name: Christie Passage (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected shell, sand beach. Grassy, partially treed area on an midden shelf above beach. Sheltered. No facilities. Random wilderness camping allowed. Avoid fires except on beach, not on midden. Attractive. Popular. Noisy generator at fish farm to ~9pm.
tags.name: Bell Island (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected steep cobble, gravel beach. Spacious, semi-exposed camp on level gravel bar. Some protection from NW. Water at creek. Attractive. Road nearby.
tags.name: Songhees Crees (BCMT)

tags.description: Protected pocket gravel beach at high water, large smooth rocks at low water. E aspect. Small sloped beach margin sites. Dense vegetation in upland. Marginal site but suitable for emergency or transitory use.
tags.name: Goodnuff Beach (BCMT)

tags.description: Beach. Some protection. Informal site secondary. Level site that has seen previous use.
tags.name: Hardy Bay northwest (BCMT)

tags.description: Potential camp site at low tide levels up to maybe 4.2m. Views to strait. Sand / mud / gravel beach on NE side, rocks on SW. Entrance to harbor passable at high tides, perhaps 4.5m+.
tags.name: Robinson Pass Low Tide
